<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#10ZAB41401_5">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kq41402_exhibit_10.23"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kq41402_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit 10.23    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kq41402_allegiant_travel_company_restricted_stock_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kq41402_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY<BR>  RESTRICTED STOCK<BR>  AGREEMENT    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Restricted Stock Agreement (the "Agreement") is made as of the 16<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;day of October, 2009 ("Date of Grant")
between Allegiant Travel Company, a Nevada corporation (the "Company") and ANDREW C. LEVY ("Grantee"). </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RESTRICTED STOCK AWARDS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Company hereby grants to Grantee a total of Twenty-Seven Thousand Nine Hundred Twenty-Six (27,926) shares of the Company's Common Stock (the "Restricted
Stock") subject to the terms and conditions set forth below. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grantee
will receive a certificate identifying the number of shares of common stock issued to the Grantee as Restricted Stock. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Restricted Stock has been awarded as compensation to the Grantee for services to be rendered over the vesting period provided for herein. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;D.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
Agreement sets forth the terms, conditions and restrictions applicable to the Restricted Stock granted to Grantee. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RESTRICTIONS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Restricted Stock has been awarded to the Grantee subject to the transfer and forfeiture conditions set forth in Paragraph&nbsp;B below (the "Restrictions") which
shall lapse, if at all, as described in Section&nbsp;3 below. For purposes of this Award, the term Restricted Stock includes any additional shares of stock granted to the Grantee with respect to any
Restricted Stock (e.g.,&nbsp;shares issued upon a stock dividend or stock split) prior to the vesting of the Restricted Stock. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grantee
may not directly or indirectly, by operation of law or otherwise, voluntarily or involuntarily, sell, assign, pledge, encumber, charge or otherwise transfer (a
"transfer") any of the Restricted Stock prior to vesting as provided in Section&nbsp;3 below. Any transfer or attempted transfer prior to such time shall be null and void and of no effect
whatsoever. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If
the Grantee's employment with the Company terminates prior to the vesting of all Restricted Stock of the Grantee for any reason other than as set forth in
Section&nbsp;3 below, then the Grantee shall forfeit all of the Grantee's right, title and interest in and to the Restricted Stock not vested as of the date of such termination and such Restricted
Stock shall be reconveyed to the Company as of the date of such termination without further consideration or any act or action by the Grantee. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;D.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Restrictions imposed under this Section&nbsp;2 shall apply to all shares of the Company's common stock or other securities issued with respect to Restricted Stock
hereunder in connection with any merger, reorganization, consolidation, recapitalization, stock dividend or other change in corporate structure affecting the common stock of the Company which occurs
prior to the vesting of the Restricted Stock. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EXPIRATION AND TERMINATION OF RESTRICTIONS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Restrictions imposed under Section&nbsp;2 above will expire
and vesting of the Restricted Stock shall be as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On
October&nbsp;16, 2010, the Restrictions will expire with respect to one-third (<SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL>) of the Restricted Stock of the Grantee not forfeited
prior to that date; </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On
October&nbsp;16, 2011, the Restrictions will expire with respect to an additional one-third (<SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL>) of the Restricted Stock of the Grantee
not forfeited prior to that date; and </FONT></P>

</UL>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="5",CHK=625933,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KQ41402A.;21',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_kq41402_1_2"> </A>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On
October&nbsp;16, 2012, the Restrictions will expire with respect to the balance of the Restricted Stock of the Grantee not forfeited prior to that date. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Notwithstanding
anything herein to the contrary, the following special vesting rules shall apply: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;All
Restricted Stock of the Grantee shall become fully vested upon the Grantee's death or total disability. Total disability shall be defined as a physician certified
disability which permanently or indefinitely renders the Grantee unable to perform his usual duties for the Company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;All
Restricted Stock of the Grantee shall become fully vested upon the termination of Grantee's employment by the Company without "Cause" or the termination of
Grantee's employment with the Company by Employee for "Good Reason" ("Cause" and "Good Reason" as defined in that certain Employment Agreement between the Company and Grantee as of even date hereof). </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event a Change of Control transaction is consummated as a result of a definitive agreement entered into by the Company prior to October&nbsp;16, 2010, vesting
of the Restricted Stock shall be accelerated to the extent of a percentage equal to the number of full months between the date of this grant and the date of execution of the definitive agreement for
the Change of Control transaction divided by 12. By way of amplification, the terms of the preceding sentence shall apply if a definitive agreement for a Change of Control transaction is entered into
prior to October&nbsp;16, 2010 and if the Change of Control transaction contemplated by such definitive agreement is ultimately closed, whether or not closed prior to October&nbsp;16, 2010. By way
of example, if the definitive agreement for a Change of Control transaction is entered into as of April&nbsp;30, 2010, six (6)&nbsp;full months shall have passed since the grant date and Employee
shall be <SUP>6</SUP>/<SMALL>12</SMALL> (or 50%) vested in the Restricted Stock granted hereunder. Upon any other Change of Control, any unvested Restricted Stock, to the extent not previously forfeited, shall
automatically vest. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;For
purposes of subparagraph&nbsp;(iii) above, a "Change of Control" shall be deemed to have occurred if at any time after the date this Agreement is signed:
(w)&nbsp;by any method, transaction or series of related transactions, more than 50% of the outstanding shares of Company or beneficial ownership
thereof are acquired within a period of one year by a person or group (as defined in Section&nbsp;13(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934) other than the members of Company's Board of
Directors, those persons who were more than 5% owners of the Company prior to the date of this Agreement, employees of the Company and any of their immediate family members and affiliates;
(x)&nbsp;there is a merger or consolidation of the Company in which the Company is not the continuing or surviving entity or in which the stockholders of the Company immediately before such
transaction do not own in the aggregate at least 50% of the outstanding voting shares of the continuing or surviving entity immediately after such transaction; (y)&nbsp;there is a merger or
consolidation of the Company pursuant to which the Company's shares are converted into cash, securities or other property; or (z)&nbsp;the Company sells, leases or exchanges all or substantially all
of its assets or the Company's stockholders approve the liquidation or dissolution of the Company </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ADJUSTMENTS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the number of outstanding shares of common stock of the Company is changed as a result of a
stock dividend, stock split or the like without additional consideration to the Company, the number of shares of Restricted Stock under this Agreement shall be adjusted to correspond to the change in
the outstanding shares of the Company's common stock. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="5",CHK=472914,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KQ41402A.;21',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_kq41402_1_3"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;VOTING AND DIVIDENDS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the restrictions contained in Section&nbsp;2 hereof, the Grantee shall
have all rights of a stockholder of the Company with respect to the Grantee's Restricted Stock, including the right to vote the shares of the Grantee's Restricted Stock and the right to receive any
cash or stock dividends, including dividends of stock of a company other than the Company. Stock dividends issued with respect to the Grantee's Restricted Stock shall be treated as additional shares
of the Grantee's Restricted Stock (even if they are shares of a company other than the Company) that are subject to the same restrictions and other terms and conditions that apply to the shares with
respect to which such dividends are issued. If a dividend is paid in other property, the Grantee will be credited with the amount of property which would have been received had the Grantee owned a
number of shares of common stock equal to the number of shares of Restricted Stock credited to his or her account. The property so credited will be subject to the same restrictions and other terms and
conditions applicable to the Restricted Stock under this Agreement and will be disbursed to the Grantee in kind simultaneously with the Restricted Stock to which such property relates. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;DELIVERY OF SHARES.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The shares of Restricted Stock of the Grantee will be issued in the name of the Grantee
as Restricted Stock and will be held by the Company prior to vesting in certificated or uncertificated form. If a certificate for Restricted Stock is issued prior to vesting, such certificate shall be
registered in the name of the Grantee and shall bear a legend in substantially the following form: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>"This
certificate and the shares of stock represented hereby are subject to the terms and conditions (including forfeiture and restrictions against transfer) contained in a Restricted Stock Agreement
dated
October&nbsp;16, 2009, between the registered owner of the shares represented hereby and Allegiant Travel Company. Release from such terms and conditions shall be made only in accordance with the
provisions of such Agreement, copies of which are on file in the office of Allegiant Travel Company." </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon
request from the Company, the Grantee shall deposit with the Company a stock power, or powers, executed in blank and sufficient to reconvey the Restricted Stock to the Company upon
any forfeiture of the Restricted Stock (or a portion thereof), in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement. Upon vesting of any Restricted Stock, any stock certificates and stock powers
relating to such vested Restricted Stock shall be released to the Grantee upon request. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WITHHOLDING TAXES.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company is entitled to withhold an amount equal to the Company's required minimum
statutory withholding taxes for the respective tax jurisdiction attributable to any share of common stock or property deliverable in connection with the Restricted Stock. Grantee may satisfy any
withholding obligation in whole or in part by electing to have the Company retain shares of the Restricted Stock having a Fair Market Value on the date of vesting equal to the minimum amount to be
withheld. Fair Market Value for this purpose shall be the closing price for a share of the Company's common stock on the last trading day before the date of vesting. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;8.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;OTHER RIGHTS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The grant of Restricted Stock does not confer upon Grantee any right to continue in the employ
of the Company and does not interfere with the right of the Company to terminate Grantee's employment at any time. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOTICES.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any written notice under this Agreement shall be deemed given on the date that is three business
days after it is sent by registered or certified mail, postage prepaid, addressed either to the Grantee at his or her address as indicated in the Company's employment records or to the Company at its
principal office. Any notice may be sent using any other means (including personal delivery, expedited courier, messenger service, telecopy, ordinary mail or electronic mail) but no such notice shall
be deemed to have been duly given unless and until it is actually received by the intended recipient. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="5",CHK=461324,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KQ41402A.;21',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_kq41402_1_4"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NONTRANSFERABILITY.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement and all rights hereunder are nontransferable and nonassignable by the
Grantee, other than by the last will and testament of Grantee or the laws of descent and distribution, unless the Company consents thereto in writing. Any transfer or attempted transfer except
pursuant to the preceding sentence shall be null and void and of no effect whatsoever. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;11.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION&nbsp;83(b) ELECTION.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grantee may make an election to be taxed upon the grant of his or her
Restricted Stock under Section&nbsp;83(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended. To effect such election, the Grantee must file an appropriate election with the Internal Revenue Service
within thirty (30)&nbsp;days after the grant of the Restricted Stock and otherwise in accordance with the applicable Treasury Regulations. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;12.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AMENDMENT.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement may not be amended except by a writing signed by the Company and Grantee. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;13.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HEIRS AND SUCCESSORS.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to Section&nbsp;10 above, this Agreement and all terms and conditions hereof
shall be binding upon the Company and its successors and assigns, and upon the Grantee and their heirs, legatees and legal representatives. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;14.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;INTERPRETATION.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any issues of interpretation of any provision of this Agreement shall be resolved by the
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;15.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SEVERABILITY.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The provisions of this Agreement, and of each separate section and subsection, are severable,
and if any one or more provisions may be determined to be illegal or otherwise unenforceable, in whole or in part, the remaining provisions, and any unenforceable provisions to the extent enforceable,
shall nevertheless be binding and enforceable. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;16.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;GOVERNING LAW.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All questions concerning the construction, validity and interpretation of this Agreement
shall be governed by and construed according to the internal law and not the law of conflicts of the State of Nevada. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;17.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WAIVER.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The failure of the Company to enforce at any time any provision of this Agreement shall in no way be
construed to be a waiver of such provision or any other provision hereof. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>[THE
REMAINDER OF THIS PAGE INTENTIONALLY LEFT BLANK] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<A NAME="page_kq41402_1_5"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has executed this Agreement as of day and year first above written. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ks41402_exhibit_10.24"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ks41402_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;10.24    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ks41402_allegiant_travel_compa__ks402417"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ks41402_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY    <BR>    <BR>    </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>STOCK APPRECIATE RIGHTS AGREEMENT</I></B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS
STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is made and entered into as of October&nbsp;16, 2009 (the "Effective Date"), between ALLEGIANT
TRAVEL COMPANY, a Nevada corporation (the "Company") and Andrew C. Levy (the "Participant"). </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THE
PARTIES AGREE AS FOLLOWS: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>1.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long Term Incentive Plan</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The exercise of the Stock
Appreciation Rights granted under this Agreement shall be subject to the terms, conditions and restrictions of the Allegiant Travel Company 2006 Long-Term Incentive Plan (the "Plan"). A
copy of the Plan is available to Participant upon request and is incorporated in this Agreement by this reference. Terms used in this Agreement that are defined in the Plan shall have the same meaning
as in the Plan, unless the text of this Agreement clearly indicates otherwise. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>2.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grant of Stock Appreciation Rights</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company hereby grants
to Participant pursuant to the Plan stock appreciation rights (the "SARs") with respect to seventy-five thousand (75,000) shares (the "Shares") of the Company's $.001 par value common
stock (the "Common Stock") on the terms and conditions set forth herein and in the Plan. The SARs consist of the right to receive, upon exercise of the SAR (or any portion thereof) a number of shares
of Common Stock equal to (x)&nbsp;the number of SARs being exercised multiplied by the excess of the Fair Market Value (as defined in the Plan) of the Common Stock on the date upon which the
Participant exercises the SAR (or any portion thereof) over the Exercise Price, with the result divided by (y)&nbsp;the Fair Market Value of the Common Stock on the date of such exercise. The SARs
shall not be settled in cash or in any property other than shares of Common Stock in the Company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>3.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exercise Price</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The exercise price (the "Exercise Price") for
the SARs covered by this Agreement shall be $38.65 per share. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>4.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adjustment of SARs</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall adjust the number of
Shares subject to the SARs and the Exercise Price of the SARs in certain circumstances in accordance with the provisions of Item&nbsp;11 of the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>5.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exercise of SARs</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exercise of SARs.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the other terms of this Agreement, Participant's right to exercise the SARs
granted hereunder shall be subject to the following Vesting Schedule wherein Participant shall be entitled to exercise his SARs at any point in time during this Agreement only to the extent indicated
below: </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ks41402_vesting_schedule"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ks41402_3"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Vesting Schedule    <BR>    </I></B></FONT></P>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:60%;margin-left:20%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE width="100%"  BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR><!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS SET -->
<TD WIDTH="" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="12pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="111pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS END --></TR>

<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH NOWRAP  ALIGN="LEFT" style="font-family:times;"><DIV style="border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;width:17pt;"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Date

<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCROPPEDRULE,17pt -->

 </B></FONT></DIV></TH>
<TH style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Number of SARs<BR>
First Becoming Vested </B></FONT></TH>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>First anniversary of Effective Date</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL> of SARs granted</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Second anniversary of Effective Date</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL> of SARs granted</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Third anniversary of Effective Date</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><SUP>1</SUP>/<SMALL>3</SMALL> of SARs granted</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
 </DIV>
 <P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
SARs of the Participant shall become fully vested upon the termination of the Participant's employment by the Company without "Cause" or the termination of the Participant's
employment with the Company by Employee for "Good Reason" ("Cause" and "Good Reason" as defined in that certain Employment Agreement between the Company and the Participant as of even date hereof). </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=602343,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KS41402A.;24',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_ks41402_1_2"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event a Change of Control transaction is consummated as a result of a definitive agreement entered into by the Company prior to October&nbsp;16, 2010, vesting of the SARs shall
be accelerated to the extent of a percentage equal to the number of full months between the date of this grant and the date of execution of the definitive agreement for the Change of Control
transaction divided by 12. By way of amplification, the terms of the preceding sentence shall apply if a definitive agreement for a Change of Control transaction is entered into prior to
October&nbsp;16, 2010 and if the Change of Control transaction contemplated by such definitive agreement is ultimately closed, whether or not closed prior to October&nbsp;16, 2010. By way of
example, if the definitive agreement for a Change of Control transaction is entered into as of April&nbsp;30, 2010, six (6)&nbsp;full months shall have passed since the grant date and Employee
shall be <SUP>6</SUP>/<SMALL>12</SMALL> (or 50%) vested in the SARs granted hereunder. Upon any other Change of Control, any unvested SARs, to the extent not previously forfeited, shall automatically vest. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Partial Exercise.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms of the Plan, the SARs (to the extent vested as provided in
Paragraph&nbsp;5A above) may be exercised in whole or in part. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Method of Exercising SARs.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to Paragraph&nbsp;5A above, any SARs granted hereunder or any portion
thereof may be exercised by the Participant by delivering to the Company at its main office
(attention of its Secretary) written notice which shall set forth the Participant's election to exercise a portion or all of the vested SARs, the number of SARs with respect to which the SARs rights
are being exercised and such other representations and agreements as may be required by the Company to comply with applicable securities laws. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;D.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Nonassignability of SARs.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The SARs shall not be assignable or transferable by the Participant except by will
or by the laws of descent and distribution. Any distributee by will or by the laws of descent and distribution shall be bound by the provisions of the Plan and this Agreement. During the life of the
Participant, the SARs shall be exercisable only by the Participant. Any attempt to assign, pledge, transfer, hypothecate or otherwise dispose of the SARs, and any levy of execution, attachment or
similar process on the SARs, shall be null and void. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;E.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Termination of Employment other than as a Result of Death or Disability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If Participant ceases to be an
Employee other than as a result of Participant's death or disability (as defined in Paragraph&nbsp;F below), then the SARs shall be exercisable only to the extent exercisable
(</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, vested) on the date of termination of employment or to the extent the SARs become exercisable on the date of termination as provided in
Paragraph&nbsp;5A above. In such event, the vested SARs must be exercised on or before the date that is one hundred eighty (180)&nbsp;days after the effective date of termination of employment. To
the extent any portion of the SARs is not exercisable (</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, not vested after consideration of any acceleration of vesting pursuant to
Paragraph&nbsp;5A above) on the date of termination of employment, such nonvested portion of the SARs shall terminate on the date of termination of employment. To the extent any portion of the SARs
is not exercised on or before the date that is one hundred eighty (180)&nbsp;days after the date of termination of employment, such portion of the SARs shall terminate as of the end of such date.
Nothing in the Plan shall be construed as imposing any obligation on the Company to continue the employment of Participant or shall interfere or restrict in any way the rights of the Company to
discharge Participant at any time for any reason whatsoever, with or without cause. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=433987,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KS41402A.;24',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_ks41402_1_3"> </A>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;F.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Termination of Employment as a Result of Death or Disability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of the death or disability of the
Participant while in the employ of the Company, the personal representative of the Participant (in the event of Participant's death) or the Participant (in the event of Participant's disability) may,
subject to the provisions hereof and before the earlier of the SARs' expiration date or the expiration of one (1)&nbsp;year after the date of such death or disability, exercise the SARs granted to
the Participant to the same extent the Participant might have exercised such SARs on the date of Participant's death or disability (</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the extent
then vested), but not further or otherwise. To the extent any portion of the SARs is not exercisable at the date of the death or disability of the Participant
(</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the extent not then vested), such nonvested portion of the SARs shall terminate on the date of death or disability. To the extent any portion
of the SARs is not exercised within the time period provided, such portion of the SARs shall terminate as of the date of expiration of such time period. For purposes of this Paragraph&nbsp;F, the
Participant shall be considered to be subject to a disability when the Participant is
disabled within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;22(e)(3), and the date of any such disability shall be deemed to be the day following the last day the Participant performed services for the
Company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;G.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Period to Exercise SARs.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The SARs granted hereunder may, prior to their expiration or termination, be
exercised from time to time, in whole or in part, up to the total number of Shares with respect to which they shall have then become exercisable. The SARs granted hereunder may become exercisable in
installments as determined by the Committee; provided, however, that if the SARs is exercisable in more than one installment, and if the employment of the Participant is terminated, then the SARs (or
such portion thereof as shall be exercisable in accordance with the terms of this Agreement) shall be exercisable during the period set forth in Paragraph&nbsp;E or F (whichever is applicable). </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;H.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Exercise after Five Years.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The SARs shall in no event be exercisable after five (5)&nbsp;years from the
date hereof. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Issuance of Stock Certificates Upon Exercise.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of Item&nbsp;6 of this Agreement,
upon exercise of any portion or all of the SARs, the Company will issue to Participant shares of Common Stock based on the Fair Market Value of the Common Stock on the date of exercise as provided in
Item&nbsp;2 above; provided, however, that no stock certificate shall be issued to the Participant pursuant to the exercise of any SARs granted herein, in whole or in part, unless and until either:
(i)&nbsp;the Shares have been registered in accordance with the rules of the SEC, or (ii)&nbsp;Participant signs an Investment Letter in a form provided by the Company. No fractional Shares shall
be issued upon the exercise of the SARs in whole or in part. The number of Shares issuable shall be rounded to the nearest whole number (with one-half share being rounded up to the next
higher whole number). </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>6.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Restriction on Issuance of Shares; Participant's
Representations</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Securities Laws&#151;Restrictions on Issuance of Shares.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No shares of Common Stock shall be issued or
sold upon the exercise of any portion of the SARs unless and until the then applicable requirements of the Securities Act of 1933 and the applicable securities laws of any state, the rules and
regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission and any other regulations of any securities exchange on which the Common Stock may be listed, shall have been fully complied with and satisfied. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="6",CHK=692932,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KS41402A.;24',USER='CHE105388',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:30' -->
<A NAME="page_ks41402_1_4"> </A>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Acquisition for Investment; Other Representations of Participant.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the offering of shares with
respect to which the SARs are being exercised is not registered under the Securities Act of 1933, but
an exemption is available which requires an investment representation or other representation, the Participant shall, as a condition to exercise of the SARs, be required to execute such documents as
may be necessary or advisable in the opinion of counsel for the Company to comply with any federal securities laws or any applicable state securities laws. Stock certificates evidencing such
unregistered shares acquired upon exercise of the SARs shall bear a restrictive legend in substantially the following form and such other restrictive legends as are required or advisable under the
provisions of any applicable laws: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>This
stock certificate and the shares represented hereby have not been registered under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Act") nor under the securities laws of any state and shall not be
transferred at any time in the absence of (i)&nbsp;an effective registration statement under the Act and any other applicable state law with respect to such shares at such time; or (ii)&nbsp;an
opinion of counsel satisfactory to the Company and its counsel to the effect that such transfer at such time will not violate the Act or any applicable state securities laws; or (iii)&nbsp;a "no
action" letter from the Securities and Exchange Commission and a comparable ruling from any applicable state agency with respect to such state's securities laws. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Holding Period Before Sale of SARs Shares.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Participant is an insider subject to the SEC's rules under
Section&nbsp;16(b) of the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934, then the Participant shall be restricted from selling any Shares acquired by him through exercise of the SARs or any portion thereof
during the six (6)&nbsp;month period following the date of grant of the SARs. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>7.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Rights as a Shareholder</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Participant shall not have
any rights as a shareholder with respect to any Shares covered by the SARs granted hereunder until the issuance of a stock certificate for such shares. No adjustment shall be made on the issuance of a
stock certificate to the Participant as to any dividends or other rights for which the record date occurred prior to the date of issuance of such certificate. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>8.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Binding Effect</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be binding upon the
executors, administrators, heirs, legal representatives and successors of the parties hereto. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>9.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Employment Rights</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall not confer upon
Participant any right with respect to the continuance of employment by the Company, nor shall it interfere in any way with the right of the Company to terminate such employment at any time. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>10.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Governing Law</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Stock Appreciation Rights Agreement
shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Nevada. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>11.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notices</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All notices and other communications under this
Agreement shall be in writing, and shall be deemed to have been duly given on the date of delivery if delivered personally or three days after being
mailed to the party to whom notice is to be given, by certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, and addressed as follows, until any such address is changed by notice duly given: </FONT></P>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:60%;margin-left:20%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A

<A NAME="toc_ku41402_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;10.25    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Confidential treatment has been requested for portions of this document. This copy of the document filed as an Exhibit omits the confidential information subject to the
confidentiality request. Omissions are designated by the symbol [...***...]. A complete version of this document has been filed separately with the Securities and Exchange
Commission.</I></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>AIRCRAFT SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Dated as of December&nbsp;30, 2009 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>BETWEEN
</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>SCANDINAVIAN AIRLINES SYSTEM<BR>
DENMARK&#151;NORWAY&#151;SWEDEN<BR>  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>as Seller </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>and
</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY<BR>  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>as Buyer </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>EIGHTEEN
(18)&nbsp;MCDONNELL DOUGLAS MD-80 SERIES AIRCRAFT<BR>
bearing Manufacturer's Serial Numbers&nbsp;49381, 49385, 49420, 49421,<BR>
49424, 49436, 49437, 49438, 49608, 49610, 49612, 49614, 49615,<BR>
53008, 53275, 53347, 53348, and 53366 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>FAFINSKI
MARK&nbsp;&amp; JOHNSON, P.A.<BR>
Flagship Corporate Center<BR>
775 Prairie Center Drive, Suite&nbsp;400<BR>
Eden Prairie, MN 55344 </FONT></P>

 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;margin-left:10%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><BR><FONT SIZE=2>Engine Cycle Adjustment</FONT></TD>
<TD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" VALIGN="BOTTOM" style="font-family:times;"><BR><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></TD>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_ky41402_1_1"> </A>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->





<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


</FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ky41402_aircraft_sale_and_purchase_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ky41402_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  AIRCRAFT SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>AIRCRAFT SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENT</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> dated as of the 30<SUP>th</SUP>&nbsp;day
of December, 2009, is between </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SCANDINAVIAN AIRLINES SYSTEM, DENMARK&#151;NORWAY&#151;SWEDEN,</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> a consortium duly organized and existing
under the laws of Denmark, Norway and Sweden ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Seller</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY,</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> a Nevada
corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Buyer</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ky41402_w_i_t_n_e_s_s_e_t_h__"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ky41402_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  W I T N E S S E T H :    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>WHEREAS</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Seller owns the Aircraft that are the subject matter of this Agreement; and </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>WHEREAS</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Buyer desires to purchase the Aircraft from Seller, and Seller is willing to sell the Aircraft to Buyer, on the terms and subject
to the conditions set forth in this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>NOW THEREFORE</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in consideration of the foregoing premises and the mutual promises and covenants of the parties set forth herein, and for
other good and valuable consideration the adequacy and receipt of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ARTICLE 1:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>DEFINITIONS  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The following terms shall have the following respective meanings for all purposes of this Agreement: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Agreement</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means this Aircraft Sale and Purchase Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Aircraft</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means, individually or collectively, as the case may be, those certain eighteen
(18)&nbsp;McDonnell Douglas MD-80 Series aircraft, bearing manufacturer's serial numbers&nbsp;49381, 49385, 49420, 49421, 49424, 49436, 49437, 49438, 49608, 49610, 49612, 49614, 49615,
53008, 53275, 53347, 53348, and 53366, as more particularly described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto, including their respective airframes, the Engines, and
all parts, components, appliances, accessories, instruments, furnishings, alterations and other items of equipment installed in or attached to such Aircraft at Delivery or removed therefrom, so long
as title to such removed item(s) is vested in Seller, and includes, where the context permits, the Aircraft Documentation, but excluding their respective Seller Return Items. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Aircraft Delivery Receipt</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means with respect to each Aircraft an Aircraft Delivery
Receipt substantially in the form attached hereto as </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;B</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Aircraft Documentation</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means with respect to each Aircraft all log books, manuals, data
and inspection, modification, maintenance and overhaul records (including historical records) required by EASA and available to and in the possession of the Seller, including, but not limited to, the
aircraft documentation set forth in Part&nbsp;I to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;G</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Airworthiness Directives</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> or </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>ADs</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means all
airworthiness directives of the FAA. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Applicable Law</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means, without limitation, all applicable laws, treaties, international
agreements, decisions and orders of any court, arbitration or governmental agency or authority and rules, regulations, orders, directives, licenses and permits of any governmental body,
instrumentality, agency or authority. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>APU</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> mean an auxiliary power unit. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Base Price</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means with respect to each Aircraft the amount relating to such Aircraft as
set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;B</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such amount being the sum of the Airframe Price, Engine #1 Price, and Engine #2 Price as each is set forth with respect
to such Aircraft in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;B</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Bills of Sale</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means, collectively, the Warranty Bill of Sale and the FAA Bills of Sale
with respect to each Aircraft. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Business Day</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means a day other than a Saturday or Sunday on which the banks in the U.S.
and Sweden are open for the transaction of business of the type required by this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Buyer Indemnitees</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means Buyer and Buyer's officers, directors, shareholders, employees,
affiliated companies, successors, and permitted assignees. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Cape Town Convention</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means, together, the official English text of each of the
Convention on International Interests in Mobile Equipment and the Protocol thereto on Matters Specific to Aircraft Equipment each as opened for signature on 16&nbsp;November 2001 at Cape Town, South
Africa. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Certificate of Insurance</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;10.4 hereof. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Default Interest</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means interest calculated at a per annum rate (based on a three hundred
sixty (360)&nbsp;day year) which is equal to six percent (6%) plus the Prime Rate in effect on the date on which the amount was originally due through the date the amount actually is received at
Seller's Bank Account. Default Interest will accrue on a day-to-day basis and be compounded monthly. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Delivery</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means the conveyance of the Aircraft by Seller to Buyer in accordance with the
terms of this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Delivery Binder</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall mean with respect to each Aircraft a binder provided by Seller
that shall include copies of all aircraft documentation set forth in Part&nbsp;I of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;G</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Delivery Condition</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;5.4 hereof. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Delivery Date</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means the date that Delivery occurs hereunder. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

the United States of America. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

collectively, as the case may be, those certain Pratt&nbsp;&amp; Whitney
JT8D Series engines (including all components, equipment and parts installed thereon or removed therefrom) whose engine manufacturer's serial numbers are set out in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Event of Loss</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means (i)&nbsp;the hijacking, theft, or requisition of an Aircraft,
including title to such Aircraft, or the seizure, arrest, detention or confiscation of an Aircraft by any Person or government or by Persons acting or purporting to act on behalf of any government,
unless in any case such Aircraft is released within thirty (30)&nbsp;days, and (ii)&nbsp;the actual or constructive total loss, destruction, damage beyond economic repair, or permanent unfitness
for the normal use of an Aircraft for any reason whatsoever. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Excusable Delay</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means any failure of or delay by Seller in the delivery of an Aircraft
for the period that such failure or delay is due to any force majeure condition, acts of nature, war, insurrection or riots, fire, explosion or serious accident, governmental priorities or allocation,
strike or labor dispute,
inability to obtain Aircraft materials, accessories, equipment, or parts from the vendors, or any other cause which, in each case, is beyond Seller's control. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

may be assessed or levied against a party by any Taxing Jurisdiction as a result of the sale, transfer or delivery of the Aircraft to Buyer or the registration, ownership, possession, control,
operation, use or </FONT></P>

<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=7,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="7",CHK=580743,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KY41402A.;6',USER='CHE105200',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:33' -->
<A NAME="page_ky41402_1_4"> </A>
<BR>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>importation
of the Aircraft by Buyer, including without limitation, all sales, use, retailer, transfer, income, value added, or other excise taxes, or any tax that results from the gross negligence or
willful misconduct of the Buyer or any of its constituent members or an affiliate thereof or the inaccuracy or breach of any representation, warranty or covenant of the Buyer contained in this
Agreement; provided, however, that "Taxes" shall not include (A)&nbsp;any taxes, duties, levies, imposts, withholdings or fees of any kind which may be assessed or levied against any Seller
Indemnitee by any Scandinavian (Sweden, Denmark or Norway) or Spanish Taxing Jurisdiction as a result of (i)&nbsp;the sale, transfer or delivery of the Aircraft from Seller to Buyer, or
(ii)&nbsp;the deregistration or ownership of the Aircraft prior to Delivery, or (iii)&nbsp;exportation of the Aircraft, in all cases assessed or levied by such Scandinavian or Spanish Taxing
Jurisdiction, (B)&nbsp;any taxes, duties, levies, imposts, withholdings or fees of any kind which may be assessed or levied relating to any sale, transfer or delivery of the Aircraft prior to
Delivery and sale of the Aircraft to Buyer, (C)&nbsp;any tax that results from the gross negligence or willful misconduct of the Seller or any of its constituent members or an affiliate thereof or
the inaccuracy or breach of any representation, warranty or covenant of the Seller contained in this Agreement, or (D)&nbsp;any taxes, duties or impositions based on, or imposed with reference to,
the income of the Seller or any Seller Indemnitee. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Taxing Jurisdiction</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>"</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> means any federal, state, county, local, airport, district, foreign,
or other governmental authority or agency that imposes Taxes. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT

form of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;F</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ARTICLE 2:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>AGREEMENT TO SELL AND PURCHASE  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to Article&nbsp;6 hereof, Seller agrees to sell and deliver the Aircraft to Buyer, and Buyer agrees to purchase and accept
delivery of the Aircraft from Seller, in accordance with and subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ARTICLE 3:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>PURCHASE PRICE AND TAXES  </I></B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.1</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Purchase Price.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The purchase price for each Aircraft to be paid by Buyer to Seller is set forth
in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;B</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto, which may be reduced pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.2, and subject to the provisions of Section&nbsp;5.11 below (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Purchase Price</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.2</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Engine Cycle Adjustment.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If the total cycles of an Engine at Delivery is greater than the total
cycles of such Engine as set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto, then the Purchase Price or Base Price (as applicable) of such Aircraft shall be decreased
by an amount equal to [...***...] multiplied by the difference between the total cycles at Delivery and the total cycles of such Engine as set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereto. </FONT></DD></DL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Confidential treatment has been requested for portions of this document. This copy of the document filed as an Exhibit omits the confidential information subject to the
confidentiality request. Omissions are designated by the symbol [...***...]. A complete version of this document has been filed separately with the Securities and Exchange
Commission.</I></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=8,EFW="2197041",CP="ALLEGIANT TRAVEL COMPANY",DN="7",CHK=250724,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK135:[10ZAB2.10ZAB41402]KY41402A.;6',USER='CHE105200',CD=';6-MAR-2010;16:33' -->
<A NAME="page_ky41402_1_5"> </A>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.3</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Tax Liabilities.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Purchase Price and all other payments to be made by Buyer to Seller under
this Agreement are exclusive of all Taxes. Buyer hereby agrees to promptly pay, and indemnify each Seller Indemnitee against, any and all Taxes. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if a claim is made
against Seller for Taxes with respect to which Buyer is liable for a payment or indemnity under this Agreement, Seller will promptly give Buyer notice in writing of such claim provided, however, that
Seller's failure to give notice will not relieve Buyer of its obligations hereunder unless such failure materially impairs or precludes Buyer's ability to contest the claim. So long as (i)&nbsp;a
contest of such Taxes does not involve any substantial danger of the sale, forfeiture or loss of the Aircraft or any interest therein, (ii)&nbsp;if Seller so requests, Buyer has provided Seller with
an opinion of independent tax counsel that a reasonable basis exists for contesting such claim and (iii)&nbsp;an adequate bond has been posted, then Seller at Buyer's written request will in good
faith, with due diligence and at Buyer's expense, contest (or permit Buyer to contest in the name of Buyer or Seller) the validity, applicability or amount of such Taxes. Seller will provide Buyer
with such information as Buyer may reasonably request to enable independent counsel to issue an opinion and to enable Buyer to contest such Taxes in Buyer's or Seller's name.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.4</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Gross-Up.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of any payment to be made by Buyer to Seller hereunder,
including, without limitation, payments in respect of the Purchase Price, will be made free and clear of all set-offs, withholdings, counterclaims, Taxes, fees and duties.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.5</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>No Adjustments.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as described in this Agreement or otherwise agreed between Seller and
Buyer in writing, no adjustments will be made to any amount owing hereunder based on the maintenance status or condition of the Aircraft based on any other fact, circumstance or situation whatsoever,
whether contemplated or unforeseeable. </FONT></DD></DL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ARTICLE 4:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>PAYMENT</I></B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.1</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Payment of Purchase Price.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not less than one (1)&nbsp;Business Day prior to the Delivery Date
of an Aircraft hereunder, Buyer shall pay, in readily available cash, the full amount of the Base Price for such Aircraft, subject to Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.2</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Seller's Bank Account.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Purchase Price and other payments due from Buyer to Seller under
this Agreement will be paid by wire transfer of immediately available U.S. Dollar funds to the following bank account, or to such other bank account as Seller may from time to time designate by
written notice ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Seller's Bank Account</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"): </FONT></DD></DL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> ARTICLE 5:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>DELIVERY AND ACCEPTANCE</I></B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.1</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Scheduled Delivery Date.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Scheduled Delivery Date for an Aircraft hereunder shall be the
date set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> relating to such Aircraft, or such other date as may be mutually agreed between Buyer and Seller (each a
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Scheduled Delivery Date</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.2</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Pre-Delivery Maintenance.</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Seller shall, at one (1)&nbsp;week intervals during the
pre-delivery maintenance (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>PDM</I></B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") of an Aircraft hereunder, provide Buyer with formal Ferry Flight and delivery date forecasts and
updates, as well as information on the scope of the PDM being completed. </FONT></DD></DL>
